statements: DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE pickup_location = 'Factory A' AND waste_type = 'Chemical Waste';
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE service_date < '2022-01-01' AND waste_type = 'Toxic' OR quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_status = 'scheduled' AND pickup_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'incineration' AND disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
DELETE FROM pickup_schedule WHERE disposal_completed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services WHERE service_id = 1001 AND scheduled_by_user_id = 500;
